name: Pendulum - PROTOTYPE
description:
Swing around grapple points to control the flow of time itself in this platformer!

---

This is a prototype built to test a mechanic, and as such the visuals do not represent a polished game and there may not be a full game made from this concept. All feedback is welcome. Enjoy!

--

Controls:

Left/Right arrows / A/D keys : Move left/right

Up arrow / W key : Jump

H key (while aiming at a grapple point) : Grapple
